result.eng: She keeps account of the spending.
result.html: Coimeádann sí cuntas den chaiteachasShe keeps account of the spending.
result.ponchtml: Coimeádann sí cuntas den ċaiteaċasShe keeps account of the spending.

result.eng: Do you have a bank account?
result.html: An bhfuil cuntas bainc agatDo you have a bank account?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil cuntas bainc agatDo you have a bank account?

result.eng: She gave us an account of her adventures in Africa.
result.ga: Thug sí cuntas dúinn ar a heachtraí san Afraic
result.orig: Thug sí cuntas dúinn ar a heachtraí san Afraic
result.html: Thug sí cuntas dúinn ar a heachtraí san AfraicShe gave us an account of her adventures in Africa.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug sí cuntas dúinn ar a heaċtraí san AfraicShe gave us an account of her adventures in Africa.

result.html: Tá do chuntas dúntaYour account is closed.
result.ponchtml: Tá do ċuntas dúntaYour account is closed.
